Row.Text: Greetings to you, fellow warrior. I am Mori Motonari, of Aki. What will history say of our meeting?
I am Motonari, of the Mori Clan. I will lead my family out of Aki Province, across Honshu, and soon all of Japan.
Divided, you will perish. Learn the lesson that I failed to understand.
We are always pleased to see our allies.
Without allies you are little more than a single arrow.
I was once surrounded by enemy lords. Ask yourself, where are they now?
It seems our destinies may cross sooner than I anticipated.
It is with a heavy heart that I must ask this of you. Know that the Mori always repay such generosity.
Sometimes, it is not enough to simply know history. One has to make it, too.
Three arrows are far harder to break than one alone. {1_CivName} and the Mori are pleased to have you as an ally.
Three arrows are far harder to break than one alone. We have requested to join your alliance with {1_CivName}.
Our people are now visiting your sacred isle and drinking tea from your pottery. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are visiting our sacred isle and drinking tea from our pottery. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
